fields.name: Fighter
fields.info: Also commonly known as bruisers, Fighters have both defensive and offensive capabilities, and they are great at drawn out duels.

fields.name: Tank
fields.info: Tanks have high defensive stats, and are capable of absorbing a lot of damage. However, their damage output is lower.

fields.name: Mage
fields.info: Mages specialize in dealing magic damage, mainly relying on casting spells to do so.

fields.name: Assassin
fields.info: Assassins are able to provide a quick burst of damage on a vulnerable threat.

fields.name: Marksman
fields.info: Marksmen specialize in dealing high, consistent damage and have the highest potential damage output.

fields.name: Support
fields.info: Supports assist the team, by providing shields, healing, and buffs to their teammates.
